Text: That was a lot of work with almost no one bothering to take the time to say thanks. Quality is always favored over quantity. Now if only konashine would magically appear again.Thanks for all the posts.
YES THANKS FOR ALL YOUR GREAT EFFORT ON BEAT CLUB

I think its fantastic to finally see these amazing archive shows in excellent quality . .as a collector like many I've had a lot of these shows on crappy old VHS tapes from years ago . .at long last we get to see them as they were intended . your generosity in uploading these important musical gems is very much apretiated . .
